casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
James CHARLES No. 215P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 20, 2018. Alvin William Keller, Jr., Assistant Attorney General, Greg Newman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. M. Gordan Widenhouse, Jr., Attorney at Law, for Charles, James.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 10th of July 2018 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of September 2018."
